snippet: Oklahoma is the fourth state to require women to wait at least 72 hours before receiving an abortion.
abstract: Oklahoma Gov Mary Fallin signs measure making state fourth in which women will be required to wait at least 72 hours before receiving an abortion.
lead_paragraph: Oklahoma is the fourth state to require women to wait at least 72 hours before receiving an abortion.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Longer Wait Required for an Abortion
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Longer Wait Required for an Abortion
